Package com.msasc.lib.db.rdbms

Class DBMetaData

java.lang.Object
com.msasc.lib.db.rdbms.DBMetaData
Direct Known Subclasses:
MariaDBMetaData
public abstract class DBMetaData extends Object
Information about the database. This information is implemented by the adapters, either using JDBC DatabaseMetaData or directly querying the database system tables when the driver implementation is not satisfactorily implemented.
Author:
Miquel Sas

      public abstract RecordSet getColumns(String catalog, String schema, String table, String column) throws SQLException
      Return a record set with the list of columns.
      Parameters:
      catalog - The filter catalog, can be a string with a LIKE form as '%...%'.
      schema - The filter schema, can be a string with a LIKE form as '%...%'.
      table - The filter table, can be a string with a LIKE form as '%...%'.
      column - The filter column, can be a string with a LIKE form as '%...%'.
      Returns:
      The record set of schemas.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs.
